example.eg: Tear off a strip of paper.
The strip of yellow paint in the middle of the road is not a motorcycle lane!
example.egtrans: 道路中间的黄色油漆条纹可不是摩托车道！

example.eg: Land the plane on the strip.
example.egtrans: 把飞机降落在简易机场上。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 简易机场, 简易跑道

example.eg: Strip the baby and bathe him.
example.egtrans: 脱光婴儿的衣服，给他洗澡。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 脱去, 脱光, 脱下

example.eg: I sometimes strip old furniture and then paint it.
example.egtrans: 有时我会把旧家具的涂层刮掉，重新上漆。

example.eg: He stripped and jumped into the water.
The dress has a frilly strip at the waist.
example.egtrans: 这条裙子在腰部有一根褶边的狭条。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 边缘, 边沿, 狭条

example.eg: The team's away strip is red.
example.egtrans: 客场球队的队服是红色的。

example.eg: Before repainting, we need to strip and sand.
example.egtrans: 重新粉刷前，我们需要刮去旧油漆，然后再用砂纸打磨。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 刮去原来的涂料, 刮去旧油漆

example.eg: We strip the bed every third day in summer.
If you strip the tree, it will lose all its sap and die.
The thorns stripped the flesh from his bare arms.
If you strip the threads the screw will not hold.
The mechanic stripped the engine completely and then rebuilt it.
example.egtrans: 机械师彻底地拆卸了引擎，之后又重新组装了。

dsense.name: strip [sth]
dsense.guideword: (remove insulation from wire) (电线的隔绝层)

example.eg: They stripped the stolen car of its valuable parts.
The businessman was found guilty of fraud and the court stripped him of his assets.
example.egtrans: 那个商人被判有诈骗罪，法院没收了他的财产。

example.eg: Strip the wallpaper from the wall.
We'll have to use the sandblaster to strip away all that paint.
Strip away all the glitz and glamour, and celebrities are just ordinary people, like you and me.
In these economic hard times, many families have stripped their grocery budget down to a few staple items.
I had to strip down to my underwear for my medical examination.
If one is searched by the police, very often one must strip off.
Garfield comic strips are very funny.

dsense.name: fieldstrip [sth], field-strip [sth]
dsense.guideword: mainly US (cigarette butt: leave no trace of) (烟头)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 拆解丢弃, 拆分丢弃

example.eg: The pilot was unable to see the landing strip due to thick fog.
The red car swerved and landed on the median strip facing the wrong way. The car skidded through the barrier and onto the central reservation.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 道路的中央分隔带, 道路隔离带, 马路绿化带

example.eg: You can plug your PC, monitor, and so on into a power strip.

dsense.name: strip mall
dsense.guideword: US (row of shops along parking area) (停车场边的)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 购物饮食街, 商店街
露天开采, 露天采矿

example.eg: Before applying new wallpaper, I need to strip the old paper off the walls.
If you can strip out all the excess wording, you'll have a better report in the end.

dsense.name: strip poker
dsense.guideword: (card game in which clothes are taken off)

example.eg: I'm far too shy ever to play strip poker.
The police officers carried out a strip search of the man who they had arrested.

dsense.name: strip tease, striptease
dsense.guideword: (erotic dance in which clothes are taken off)

example.eg: The fraternity hired a woman to perform a striptease at the party.
The company strip-mined the area for coal.
Many of his stories have been strip-mined from his personal life.
The US Marsals strip-searched the passenger who was suspected of carrying drugs.

dsense.name: tear [sb] off a strip, tear a strip off [sb]
weatherstrip, weather strip, weatherstripping, weather stripping

trans_examp.trans_cn: 挡风雨条, 防水衬条
